info.description: MCP Identity Registry API can be used for managing entities in the Maritime Connectivity Platform.

revokationReason.description: The reason the certificates has been revoked

revokedAt.description: The date the certificate revocation should be activated.

certificates.description: Cannot be created/updated by editing in the model. Use the dedicate create and revoke calls.

permissions.description: Permissions as assigned from the organization

attributeName.description: OpenId Connect or SAML2 attribute name

attributeValue.description: OpenId Connect or SAML2 attribute value

certificates.description: Cannot be created/updated by editing in the model. Use the dedicate create and revoke calls.

federationType.description: Type of identity federation used by organization

permission.description: The permission that should be mapped to the role

roleName.description: The role that should be mapped to the permission

certDomainName.description: The domain name the service will be available on. Used in the issued certificates for the service.

certificates.description: Cannot be created/updated by editing in the model. Use the dedicate create and revoke calls.

instanceVersion.description: The version of this service instance.

oidcAccessType.description: Access type of the OpenId Connect client

oidcClientId.description: The client id of the service in MCP. Will be generated.

oidcClientSecret.description: The client secret of the service in MCP. Will be generated.

oidcRedirectUri.description: The OpenId Connect redirect uri of service.

vessel.description: The vessel that is linked to this service.
